welcome.title: Welcome to BeFit
welcome.subtitle: Let's create your personalized fitness plan

calculations.title: Precise Calculations
calculations.description: Science-based BMR, TDEE, and macro calculations tailored to your body

goals.title: Personalized Goals
goals.description: Cutting, bulking, or maintaining - we'll create the perfect plan for you

tracking.title: Easy Tracking
tracking.description: Simple tools to track your meals, workouts, and progress over time

step2.title: Basic Information
step2.description: Tell us about yourself to calculate your metabolic needs

step3.title: Gender & Activity Level
step3.description: This helps us calculate your daily energy needs accurately

activity.label: Activity Level
activity.description: Choose the option that best describes your typical week

preview.title: Your Metabolic Profile
preview.note: These are your baseline calorie needs

sedentary.label: Sedentary
sedentary.description: Little or no exercise, desk job

step4.title: Body Fat Assessment
step4.description: This helps us create more accurate macro recommendations (optional)

selector.label: How would you like to estimate your body fat?
selector.description: Choose the method that works best for you

tape.instructions: Measure with a flexible tape measure for best accuracy

visual.instructions: Select the image that best matches your current physique

unknown.description: We'll estimate based on your BMI

warnings.unknown: This estimate may be less accurate. Consider using tape measurements for better results.
warnings.visual: Visual estimates can vary. Consider professional measurement for precision.

step5.title: Fitness Goal
step5.description: What do you want to achieve?

selector.label: Select Your Primary Goal
selector.description: This determines your calorie and macro targets

cut.title: Weight Loss Journey
cut.description: Reduce body fat while preserving muscle mass
cut.focus: Calorie deficit, high protein, strength training

bulk.title: Muscle Building Phase
bulk.description: Build muscle mass with controlled weight gain
bulk.approach: Lean gains with minimal fat gain

maintain.title: Maintenance Phase
maintain.description: Maintain current weight and body composition

cut.label: Cut (Lose Weight)
cut.description: Reduce body fat while maintaining muscle mass
cut.strategy: Create a moderate calorie deficit through diet and exercise
cut.considerations: May experience some fatigue and strength loss

maintain.label: Maintain Weight
maintain.description: Maintain current weight while improving body composition
maintain.strategy: Eat at maintenance calories with adequate protein
maintain.considerations: Progress may be slower but more sustainable
maintain.expectations: Gradual improvements in strength and body composition

bulk.label: Bulk (Gain Weight)
bulk.description: Build muscle mass through controlled weight gain
bulk.strategy: Create a small calorie surplus with resistance training
bulk.considerations: Some fat gain is normal and expected

step6.title: Target Weight & Pace
step6.description: Set your target weight and how quickly you want to achieve it

direction.title: Goal Mismatch
direction.cut: For weight loss, target weight should be lower than current weight
direction.bulk: For weight gain, target weight should be higher than current weight

pace.title: Unsafe Pace
pace.unsafe: This pace may be unsafe for your goals

aggressive.title: Aggressive Pace
aggressive.message: This is quite aggressive. Consider a more moderate approach for better sustainability.

good.title: Good Plan
good.message: This looks like a sustainable and healthy approach to your goal.

unsafe.title: Unsafe Rate
unsafe.message: This rate is outside safe recommendations

aggressive.title: Aggressive Rate
aggressive.message: This may be difficult to sustain long-term

fastBulk.title: Fast Bulk
fastBulk.message: Rapid weight gain may result in excess fat gain

step7.title: Timeline Preview
step7.description: Here's what your journey will look like

cut.1: Initial water weight loss in the first week
cut.2: Possible energy dips as your body adapts
cut.3: Steady fat loss with occasional plateaus

bulk.1: Initial weight gain from increased food and water
bulk.3: Some fat gain is normal and expected

maintain.2: Focus on performance and body composition

timeline.title: Your Journey Timeline
timeline.description: Estimated progress based on your goals

notes.title: Important Notes
notes.estimation: Timeline is an estimate - actual progress may vary
notes.consistency: Consistency is more important than perfection

step8.title: Your Macro Plan
step8.description: Here are your personalized daily macro targets

protein.title: Protein
protein.description: Builds and repairs muscle tissue, keeps you full
protein.sources: Chicken, fish, eggs, legumes, Greek yogurt

carbs.title: Carbohydrates
carbs.description: Primary energy source for workouts and brain function
carbs.sources: Rice, oats, fruits, vegetables, whole grains

fat.title: Healthy Fats
fat.sources: Nuts, olive oil, avocado, fatty fish

common.1: Track your intake for the first few weeks to learn portion sizes
common.2: Focus on whole, minimally processed foods

cut.1: Prioritize protein to preserve muscle during weight loss
cut.2: Include fiber-rich foods to help with satiety

bulk.1: Spread calories throughout the day for better digestion
bulk.2: Don't forget to increase training intensity

maintain.1: Listen to your hunger cues and adjust as needed
maintain.2: Focus on performance and how you feel

advanced.title: Advanced Options
advanced.mealTimingHelp: Displays recommended macro distribution across meals

macros.title: Your Daily Macro Targets
macros.description: Personalized recommendations based on your goals

summary.title: You're All Set!
summary.subtitle: Your personalized fitness plan is ready

completion.success: Plan saved successfully! Redirecting to dashboard...
completion.error: Failed to save plan. Please try again.

summary.confirmRestart: Are you sure you want to restart the onboarding process? All current data will be lost.
